name: 网易云音乐 / Netease Music Ultimate Beta
description:
A clean, light and flat appearance for Netease Music.
一个干净，轻便，扁平的网易云音乐外观。
additional_info: Note: Since there is a security risk in Stylish, I recommend Stylus instead of Stylish. 备注: 由于Stylish存在安全风险，建议使用Stylus替代Stylish。 This is a beta version. Bug reports and suggestions are welcome. 这是一个测试版本。欢迎报Bug和提建议。 This CSS uses: Material Icons from Google 0.1.0: Beta 1.

discussions.name: 很不错！顺便给大?推荐一个网易云每日速刷听歌300首早日升LV10的工具：test.caij.com.cn:8668
